title: Oracle VirtualBox COM RPC Interface  Improper Access Control Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Oracle VirtualBox. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target host system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the COM RPC Interface. The issue results from improper access control. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Oracle has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/cpuoct2022.html
timeline:
2022-07-22 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2022-10-21 - Coordinated public release of advisory
